comments.body: For consistency here shouldn't we have a default destructor? (very minor...)
i think we want the equivalent of `std::distance(&readerArray[1], &readerArray[0]) == 1` -- the distance between contiguous ptrs should be `sizeof(T)` or something like that
argh, I don't know pointer arithmetics. the result is already in multiples of `sizeof(T)`, so this comment is totally wrong.
